::: Inferno, Marine, and rampage spun around to look at the inteternal 
defence systems and the Maximals attacking them. They were backed up agianst 
the bridge door. :::

::: Marine whispers ::: I dont know about the rest of you...but I would think 
there power would be completely drained by now.

::: Rampage ::: Rampage, Tank Mode!

::: He flips to turn into his tank mode ad begins to fire off missles at the 
surroundind defences and maximals, but he stops short when the electrified 
door sends a bolt of energy through him. :::

::: Inferno ::: Enough!

::: He turns to the door, and with all his strength pushes through it onto 
the bridge. Marine pulls Rampage through and then pushes the door closed as 
much as possible. Inferno then picks up a consol and fortifies the broken 
door with it. :::

::: Rampage, very groggy ::: You do know we are gonners....

::: Marine ::: Well, perhaps we can blow up the bri-

::: He suddenly saw the internal auto-guns pointing at them. And, he cursed 
::: Why, why do they always hav-

::: Before he could finish they opened fire on them. :::

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Hell Beast looked at the blown apart cell. Vuloris and Terminess were 
gone, vaporized probly. As for the ships structurre it was realitivly 
undamaged. There was no gaping hole as he had hoped. Rat Trap was burt, as 
was Jackle and Gremlin who were now in the CR tanks. :::

::: Transanulas ::: So, what are we going to do now?

::: Hell Beast ::: Repair the damage. Vuloris and Terminess are stuck on this 
planet, and now we will make there stay here as miserable as possible.
